description: a whatsapp bot created by mvelase technology

SESSION_ID.description: Put your SESSION_ID here. Make sure it starts with mvelase-MD

MODE.description: Mvelase mode can be public, private, inbox, or groups (in lowercase) (e.g., public)

BOT_NAME.description: write your bot name here (for example mvelase).

AUTO_TYPING.description: make it true if you want auto typing on your mvelase ai.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: paste your whatsapp number you used to link the device
